About Me

Love music, acousitc guitar enthusiast. Sungha Jung and Andrew Foy are my favorite fingerstyle guitarists. Cats lover, especially Brithish shorthairs. Love sports, ball games, swimming, weightlifting, etc. Calisthenics became my daliy workout due to COVID-19. Meat lover, cooking, photography... So happy to be in the world, born in this age.

Works & Experiences

I come from Zhejiang, China. I got my bachelors degree in Electronic Science & Technology in Zhejiang University. I got my masters degree in Electrical Engineering from University of Michigan, Ann Arbor. Now I'm living in Charlotte, NC and work as a machine learning research engineer.
